attributes.action: Either Lower the Duty on Green Fuel (LPG) or Regulate the Providers Charges
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Petrol Prices 0.82p in 2003 
- £1.06 in 2009 this is a rise of 0.24p

Liquid Petrolium Gas (LPG / Bio Fuel)
around 0.34p in 2003 - 0.64p in 2009 this has nearly doubled!

Why keep hiking the prices up when people are trying to be envioronmentally freindly and economical? It costs £1200 to convert a car to LPG. Where previously the savings would pay for the conversion very shortly. Now it is hardly worth it. 
If it is not the goverments Duty that is doing it, then please regulate the petrol stations chargings.
I remember when Petrol got down to 0.69p and now LPG is only 5p off that
